title: HONEY: The Healing Benefits of Honey. Amazing ways honey can be used to cure diseases and stay healthy.
description: This book details the ways honey can be used to cure diseases, stay healthy and beautify the body. The methods are simple to understand and practice. There are a lot of benefits that can be got from honey. Honey is a natural antibiotics that can be used to cure a myriad of diseases and illnesses with ease.This book details the right combination and ways honey can be applied to these health situations to get the best results in the shortest possible time.You will also discover how a honey diet can help you shed weight as well as maintain a beautiful glowing skin.
author: Dawn A. Miller
